metaDescription: Hi. My name is Carlos, a full-stack developer. Check out my portfolio.
metaTags: developer, back-end, front-end, full-cycle, full-stack, portfolio, CV, resume, programmer
welcomeText: I am a programmer with a degree in Computer Science, with several personal projects developed, such as web, mobile, and desktop applications, as well as some games and even a processor emulator. See more on my

_positions.title: Junior Programmer
_positions.description: I worked on the development of functionalities for the financial management system, as well as integrations with external systems through APIs. In addition, I also worked on analyzing and fixing bugs.

_positions.title: Programmer
_positions.description: Responsible for developing and maintaining the university's academic and financial web systems. Focusing on EaD, I developed APIs and worked on several integrations.

_positions.title: Junior Systems Analyst
_positions.description: Responsible for projecting, developing and maintaining the features of the university's EaD system, in addition to integrations with BlackBoard and AvaliA systems.

_projects.title: ToDo
_projects.description: ToDo is a task management application. The backend was developed in Node.js using MongoDB database, the web app in React.js and the mobile app in React Native.

_projects.title: The Blog
_projects.description: "The Blog" is a blog developed in PHP using MVC architecture, MySQL database and bootstrap framework. The content is managed by a proprietary CMS developed for the blog.

_projects.title: Little Computer 3 (LC-3)
_projects.description: "Little Computer 3 Virtual Machine" is a virtual machine (VM) developed in C++ that runs Little Computer 3 (LC-3) programs. To know how to write and run LC-3 programs in this VM, visit the project page on GitHub.

_projects.title: MoonLander
_projects.description: MoonLander is a game developed using the Godot engine. My main motivation for its development was to study Godot's gravity mechanics.

_certifications: Volunteer work – APAE Barra Velha – I was responsible for implementing its institutional website and training the administration team.
Certification GitHub Zero to Hero – MVP Microsoft Julio Arruda
cookieMessage: This website uses cookies for its operation.
